course_description: This course introduces you to the complexities of Gandhi's thought and his political action, his spiritual heights and his idiosyncrasies. We will read Gandhi's own writings, which include his autobiography, his Hind Swaraj, and several seminal articles from his journal Harijan.
sections: Class Nbr: 3200, Section #: 1, Type: LEC, Campus: ATL, Meets: MW 4:20-5:35p, Instructor: S. Kugle, Status: Open
